greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of Product_{j>=1} (1-x^(j*(j+k)))/(1-x^j). in powers of x.
comment: A(n,k) is the number of partitions of n into at most 0+k copies of 1, 1+k copies of 2, 2+k copies of 3, ... .
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 03 2018
